00031 //: Define default values
00032 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::set_defaults()
00033 {
00034   step_size_=1.0;
00035   ilo_=-4; ihi_=4;
00036   search_ni_=5;
00037 }

00053 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::set_kernel_size(int ilo, int ihi)
00054 {
00055   ilo_=ilo;
00056   ihi_=ihi;
00057 }
00058 
00059 //: Define region size in world co-ordinates
00060 //  Sets up ROI to cover given box (with samples at step_size()),
00061 //  with ref point at centre.
00062 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::set_region_size(double wi, double)
00063 {
00064   wi/=step_size();
00065   int ni = vcl_max(1,int(0.99+wi));
00066   set_kernel_size(-ni,ni);
00067 }
00068 
00069 //: Number of dimensions in the model
00070 unsigned mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::model_dim()
00071 {
00072   return sum_.size();
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 //: Initialise building
00077 // Must be called before any calls to add_example(...)
00078 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::clear(unsigned n_egs)
00079 {
00080   n_added_=0;
00081 }
00082 
00083 //: Add one example to the model
00084 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::add_example(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00085                                            const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00086                                            const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u)
00087 {
00088   int n=1+ihi_-ilo_;
00089   vnl_vector<double> v(n);
00090   vgl_vector_2d<double> u1=step_size_*u;
00091   const vgl_point_2d<double> p0 = p+ilo_*u1;
00092   vimt_sample_profile_bilin(v,image,p0,u1,n);
00093   v-=v.mean();
00094   v.normalize();
00095   if (n_added_==0) sum_=v;
00096   else             sum_+=v;
00097   n_added_++;
00098 }
00099 
00100 //: Build this object from the data supplied in add_example()
00101 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::build(mfpf_point_finder& pf)
00102 {
00103   assert(pf.is_a()=="mfpf_norm_corr1d");
00104   mfpf_norm_corr1d& nc = static_cast<mfpf_norm_corr1d&>(pf);
00105   vnl_vector<double> mean=sum_/n_added_;
00106   mean.normalize();
00107   nc.set(ilo_,ihi_,mean);
00108   set_base_parameters(nc);
00109 }
00110 
00111 //=======================================================================
00112 // Method: set_from_stream
00113 //=======================================================================
00114 //: Initialise from a string stream
00115 bool mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::set_from_stream(vcl_istream &is)
00116 {
00117   // Cycle through string and produce a map of properties
00118   vcl_string s = mbl_parse_block(is);
00119   vcl_istringstream ss(s);
00120   mbl_read_props_type props = mbl_read_props_ws(ss);
00121 
00122   set_defaults();
00123 
00124   // Extract the properties
00125   parse_base_props(props);
00126 
00127   if (props.find("ilo")!=props.end())
00128   {
00129     ilo_=vul_string_atoi(props["ilo"]);
00130     props.erase("ilo");
00131   }
00132   if (props.find("ihi")!=props.end())
00133   {
00134     ihi_=vul_string_atoi(props["ihi"]);
00135     props.erase("ihi");
00136   }
00137 
00138   // Check for unused props
00139   mbl_read_props_look_for_unused_props(
00140       "mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::set_from_stream", props, mbl_read_props_type());
00141   return true;
00142 }

00170 //: Version number for I/O
00171 short mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::version_no() const
00172 {
00173   return 1;
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::b_write(vsl_b_ostream& bfs) const
00178 {
00179   vsl_b_write(bfs,version_no());
00180   mfpf_point_finder_builder::b_write(bfs);  // Save base class
00181   vsl_b_write(bfs,ilo_);
00182   vsl_b_write(bfs,ihi_);
00183   vsl_b_write(bfs,sum_);
00184   vsl_b_write(bfs,n_added_);
00185 }
00186 
00187 //=======================================================================
00188 // Method: load
00189 //=======================================================================
00190 
00191 void mfpf_norm_corr1d_builder::b_read(vsl_b_istream& bfs)
00192 {
00193   if (!bfs) return;
00194   short version;
00195   vsl_b_read(bfs,version);
00196   switch (version)
00197   {
00198     case (1):
00199       mfpf_point_finder_builder::b_read(bfs);  // Load base class
00200       vsl_b_read(bfs,ilo_);
00201       vsl_b_read(bfs,ihi_);
00202       vsl_b_read(bfs,sum_);
00203       vsl_b_read(bfs,n_added_);
00204       break;
00205     default:
00206       vcl_cerr << "I/O ERROR: vsl_b_read(vsl_b_istream&)\n"
00207                << "           Unknown version number "<< version << vcl_endl;
00208       bfs.is().clear(vcl_ios::badbit); // Set an unrecoverable IO error on stream
00209       return;
00210   }
00211 }
